channel.title: Npc dialogue

item.title: Npc dialogue
item.dc:creator: @x_sam_x1 x sam x
item.description:
@x_sam_x1 wrote:

case 500: if (c.playerEquipment[c.playerAmulet] != 552) { sendNpcChat4("Blurk hangly bingjelllly grefgar!", "Blurk hangly bingjelllly grefgar!", "Blurk hangly bingjelllly grefgar!", "Blurk hangly bingjelllly grefgar!", c.talkingNpc, "Restless_Ghost"); } break;
Dont get any errors but it doesnt work in-game, can anyone help please?

Read full topic
